fields.label: Site name
fields.description: Name of this website as it appears in the website, including in the "Return to [site-name] home" link in the footer

fields.label: Organization name
fields.description: Name of the organization that owns this site. Appears in the title of the "About [organization-name]" link in the "About" module

fields.label: Default language
fields.description: Sets the default text encoding for the entire site

fields.label: Local area code
fields.description: Area code for local phone numbers. [Add note as to where this is used]

fields.label: Enable auto-detection of phone numbers
fields.description: On some web browsers (e.g., iOS), phone numbers are automatically detected and turned into tappable or clickable links. Uncheck this box to disable this behavior site-wide.

modules.title: Default Modules
modules.description: Select the modules which mobile and desktop users should see when they first enter the site.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Select the visual theme for the site. For more information about creating and modifying themes, see the developer documentation.

fields.label: Active Theme
fields.description: Active theme used by this site

detection.title: Device Detection
detection.description: e device detection service recognizes and categorizes each user's web browser so that the appropriate class of web UI can be delivered. You can run this service on your own web server, or use an externally hosted one such as the reference service provided by Modo Labs.

fields.label: Mobi service version
fields.description: Version of the Kurogo device detection service

fields.label: Use external mobi-service
fields.description: Use the external version of the Kurogo device detection service hosted by Modo Labs. This introduces a new external dependecy for your website but ensures that your system will always be accessing the latest device detection database.

fields.label: Device detection DB
fields.description: Path to the mobi-service device database file within your site

fields.label: Device detection URL
fields.description: URL of the externally hosted device-detection service

fields.label: Service cache lifetime
fields.description: Time (in seconds) that the device detection service should be cached on the server

error.title: Error Handling and Debugging
error.description: For optimal runtime performance and security, disable as many types of debugging as possible.

fields.label: Show error messages
fields.description: Show error messages generated by PHP scripts

fields.label: Enable device override
fields.description: Allow overriding device classification using /device/xxx prefix urls

fields.label: Enable module-level debugging
fields.description: Show debugging messages generated by modules

fields.label: Enable debugging mode for Minify functions
fields.description: Include verbose output in minify CSS and JavaScript data

fields.label: Enable data debugging
fields.description: Verbose logging of data retrieval and database queries

fields.label: Enable debugging of device detection services
fields.description: Show device detection in footer

fields.label: Enable production exception handler
fields.description: When enabled, the production exception handler will email details of code exceptions to the developer email. If disabled, exceptions will be shown in detail on the screen.

fields.label: Developer Email
fields.description: Address to which system-generated error messages should be sent when production exception handler is enabled. If blank, no error-message emails will be generated.

fields.label: Database type
fields.description: The database backend

fields.label: Database host
fields.description: Host name of the database server

fields.label: Database user
fields.description: User name to access the database server

fields.label: Database password
fields.description: Password to access the database server

fields.label: Database
fields.description: Name of database to store the tables

fields.label: File location
fields.description: Location of SQLite database file

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Specify how long different types of cookies will be set to persist in each user's browser.

fields.label: Module order lifespan
fields.description: User-customized order of modules to be displayed on the homescreen

fields.label: Layout cookie lifespan
fields.description: Time (in seconds) that the device detection service should be cached on the server

fields.label: Google Analytics ID
fields.description: If included, pages will be logged to Google Analytics.

strings.title: Text strings
strings.description: These string values are used throughout the site
